snippet: An industry group says a new system for monitoring where, when and how digital videos are watched would be a boon to media companies and marketers.
lead_paragraph: An industry group says a new system for monitoring where, when and how digital videos are watched would be a boon to media companies and marketers.

headline.seo: A Coding Standard to Track Media Assets Is Proposed
headline.main: Pitch for a Coding Standard to Track Media Assets and Ads
